Agree with @JackTurnipDoggyZoom quite the classic plot, nothing wrong with it tho. Altho I think the mind break was kinda too quick and in general it's quite a short story.  I would've liked to see more of her scared face and also see her struggle more in that whole "itchy cunny drug" scene. The last anal part felt kinda unnecessary and just "there" I guess. The art initself is ok, but I really liked all the faces she did (espacially the scared ones). All in all quite average and I also give this a 6/10 ((PS: @Lolisniffer based af))
